attributes.action: Call a general election rather than allow another Labour MP to become Prime Minister, should he be forced to stand down by the Parliamentary Labour Party
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is fundamentally unfair that the Parliamentary Labour Party should be allowed to elect another of it's assemblage to the post of Prime Minister without the mandate of the British people.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
